title: Graduate Research Assistant at University of Central Florida (January 2016 - Till Date)
description: I'm currently working under guidance of Dr.Gary T.Leavens on implementation of Enhanced For loop to JML(Java Modeling Language)

title: Software Developer Intern at Pandera Systems (May 2016 - August 2016)
description:
> Developed a web Application for the project which enhances the approach to expanding employee skill sets in a fast paced corporate environment.
> Developed the application from the Scratch with team of 4 members and released the beta version of the application.

Main Technologies: AngularJS, Spring Boot, REST Web Services, gulp, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Bootstrap 3 and SQL Server and Microsoft Azure Cloud Services.

> Worked in Agile Software Development with JIRA tool.
> Implemented Token (OAuth2 protocol) base security using Restful API.
> Created Virtual Machines on Azure Cloud Services through Azure Java.
> Worked on Unit Testing for front end using Jasmine and Karma.
> Involved in various phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of the application like Requirement gathering, Design, Analysis and Code development.

title: Graduate Teaching Assistant at University of Central Florida (August 2015 - December 2015)

Graduate Teaching Assistant for Intro to C Programming (COP3223) course.
My Primary Responsibilities includes :
> Hold the office hours to help the students to understand the programming concepts in C.
> Grade the assignments and examinations.
> Develop the course materials such as answer keys and supplement notes.

title: Assistant System Engineer at Tata Consultancy Services Limited, India (November 2013 - July 2015)
description:
Worked on development of Revenue Assurance Application for Telecommunication financial project. This application keep track of commission for every activation and employs various processors for different processing activities.

Main Technologies : Structs2 Framework, JSP, HTML5, CSS3 and MYSQL.

> Developed and implemented the functionalities using Struts2.0 Framework.
> Created and deployed web pages using HTML5, JSP and CSS3.
> Involved in various phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of the application like Requirement gathering, Design, Analysis and Code development.
